title: My Christmas Kink
description: Three handsome owners of a super exclusive club are offering me the story of a lifetime. But Christmas gifts won’t be the only things tied up…It’s supposed to be a simple interview for the newspaper.A story about a members-only club, its annual Christmas party, and its three sexy owners.But when I arrive, they make me an offer I can’t refuse…The perfect Christmas gift.Only, I had no idea what I was getting into until I opened the box.They’re hard…taskmasters.They know how to handle…their business.And they demand obedience…at all times.My holidays just became a lot more festive…and I hope they’ll never end.Not now that I’ve found my Christmas kink.#3 in The Reverse Harem Holiday Romance Collection1. My Christmas Quarantine (2020)2. My Christmas Cock-up3. My Christmas Kink4. My Christmas KleptoThis hot, over-the-top romance includes a holiday celebration with hot, sexy men with a penchant for pursuing the kick-a*s women who give them a run for their money. If you love outrageously naughty stories as a way to indulge your not-so-secret bad girl side, then this is the book for you.
author: Mika Lane
